creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: male figure inside hut at R playing lute with eyes shut; two figures a L observing: figure in green is seated, facing hut with head slightly bowed; smaller figure crouches, crossing hands over knee; landscape in background with rolling mountains, a waterfall, trees, moon URQ
marks: Signature and Seal LRC: [Sugawara Tamechika kore wo egaku]
title: Semimaru
